thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-BWX technologies Says Unit Awarded Contracts Valued At About C$30 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BWX technologies Says Unit Awarded Contracts Valued At About C$30 Mln
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Bwx Technologies Inc:
* BWXT AWARDED CA$30 MILLION IN CONTRACTS TO SUPPLY CRITICAL HEAT EXCHANGERS FOR BRUCE POWER
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES - UNIT AWARDED CONTRACTS VALUED AT ABOUT C$30 MILLION FROM BRUCE POWER TO DESIGN AND SUPPLY 13 CRITICAL HEAT EXCHANGERS
* BWX TECHNOLOGIES - ‍WORK RELATED TO C$30 MILLION CONTRACTS TO COMMENCE IMMEDIATELY WITH DELIVERIES OCCURRING BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
